DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.RDP.<VALUES>.ServiceName.<VAL: Name of the RDP service to install/manage (e.g. xrdp).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.RDP.<VALUES>.UserName.<VALUES: Primary user account used for RDP sessions.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.RDP.<VALUES>.SessionCmd.<VALU: Command executed to start the desktop session.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.RDP.<VALUES>.XsessionFile.<VA: Path to the xsession file used for RDP logins.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.RDP.<VALUES>.SkeletonDir.<VAL: Skeleton directory used when creating new user home directories.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.RDP.<VALUES>.UserHomeBase.<VA: Base directory under which RDP user home folders are created.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.RDP.<VALUES>.Groups.<VALUES>: List of system groups the RDP user should belong to.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.RDP.<VALUES>.SslCertDir.<VALU: Directory containing SSL certificates for RDP.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.RDP.<VALUES>.SslKeyDir.<VALUE: Directory containing SSL private keys for RDP.
